the following are some errors found during the UI review that need to be investigated:
Properties: - Review Level - Tab "All" - the list of properties is not complete - The path string is not shown, check it for file contexts and files - Formal Review: The class field was not editable
Dialogs: - The OK button seems enabled even if there is no valid input
Design Rules: - The properties shall match the ones for the group, however one refers to the folder the other one to the file
Adding one more: Navigator: - Editing the description of a comment does not refresh the label in the navigator but after closing and opening the review

Some answers
(In reply to comment #0) > the following are some errors found during the UI review that need to be > investigated: > > Properties: > - Review Level - Tab "All" - the list of properties is not complete > - The path string is not shown, check it for file contexts and files > - Formal Review: The class field was not editable
These are fixed
> > Design Rules: > - The properties shall match the ones for the group, however one refers to > the folder the other one to the file
To be consistent, the group should display the group file, not the folder

(In reply to comment #1) > Adding one more: > Navigator: > - Editing the description of a comment does not refresh the label in the > navigator but after closing and opening the review
Comments should not be editable once they are created

New additions after discusssing UI review internally among the team. These are high-priority issues to be resolved before next release is out
- Remove "Link with Editor" function in Review Navigator. The function should be commented out and refacter as a full sync later on. - Make all properties R4E properties view->All property tab read-only for now - Change R4E Properties view to have only 2 tabs: List (old All) tab and Edit tab - Use expandable composites in Edit tab to reduce footprint in view - Remember folders when triggering ad folder dialogs - New anomaly dialog: Deisng rules should be shown in searchable table like in legacy R4E - Add support to add reply to a Comment - In formal reviews, prevent phase change when email is not sent out - Disable mouse button scroll in all combo boxes - Include icon legen in help - When right-clicking in empty area of the review navigator, show default context-menu (not based on selected tree element) - New review dialog: Do not put any default review type in combo box - All New xxx dialogs: do not enable OK button until minimal information is entered - Always focus on newly created element in Review navigator tree - Always display all options in send notification type dialog - Fix scrollbars in R4E Properties view that are broken when resizing the view - All text boxes should wrap in R4E porperties view - Add command to configure the Groups/Rules sets from the review navigator (show appropriate properties) - Remove Link with porperties command from review navigator (make it always enabled)
Lower priority tasks: -Split review navigator view to show elements below the FileContext in separate table pane -Save tree expansion state beofre using refresh command and restore it afterwards

>> >> Design Rules: >> - The properties shall match the ones for the group, however one refers to >> the folder the other one to the file
>To be consistent, the group should display the group file, not the folder
This is now inmplemented both REview Group and Rule Sets show the file path in their properties
